g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.LABEL: DISPLAY-STEP-NUMBER
g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.CONDITION: the stepno of the icon-variables of the item /= "[the stepnum of the item]"
g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.ACTION: conclude that the stepno of the icon-variables of the item = "[the stepnum of the item]"

g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.LABEL: EXECUTE-STEP
g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.ACTION: in order conclude that the state of the item = the symbol UNDONE and change the passfail icon-color of the item to WHITE and start the grm-procedure upon the subworkspace of the item (the item, this window)

g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.LABEL: RESET-STEP
g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.CONDITION: the state of the item /= the symbol UNDONE
g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.ACTION: in order conclude that the state of the item = the symbol UNDONE and change the passfail icon-color of the item to the symbol WHITE

g2:Structure.g2:sa.ATTRIBUTE-INITIAL-VALUE: Copyright 1986 - 2017 Gensym Corporation. All Rights Reserved.
Developed by: Gensym Application Technology Version: 4.3 Beta Rev. 0 For use with G2 version: 7.1 Rev. 0 Copyright 1991 - 2004

g2:c.RULE.g2:a.TEXT: initially start grm-run-automated-promote (false, release-top-level, (if there exists a g2-window W such that (the g2-connection-status of W = the symbol CONNECTED and the g2-window-management-type of W = the symbol local) then W else gfr-default-window))
